description: In an elegant setting of dry-stone walls and Mediterranean vegetation, this stylish restaurant boasts personalised decor right down to the smallest detail. The new chef prepares modern dishes inspired by the region and more generally by southern Italy, with a menu that focuses on fish rather than meat, as well as a vegetarian menu. There’s also a charming cigar room with small lounge areas and a fireplace.
